forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 58F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
